name: BoolQ (Boolean Questions)
summary:
_⚠ Use card with caution_
A dataset of 15,942 naturally occurring yes/no questions paired with Wikipedia passages.
notes: Each example consists of a real user question (from search logs), a relevant Wikipedia passage, and a yes/no answer. Annotators labeled answers based on the passage. Questions often require inference or commonsense reasoning. Included in SuperGLUE.
